page.title: 08WHAT THE CHILDREN DO
page.content: Lots of people do lots of different things.Brownies, Guides,Scouts and Cubs are very exciting and people all over the world go to them. Some people in our school go swimming and they enjoy it. I like dancing and five more people like dancing as well. There are lots of different dances to do.I do Ballet,Tap,and stage. Lots of people go to old time dancing. One person from my school goes to gymnastics club,and they do forward and backward rolls,handstands and cartwheels. Our school has a Science club after the proper school and we do very hard things like finding out about the human body. Some of the boys in our school go to a BMX club and they go there to do races and tricks.
